metadata.title: CVE-2017-12805 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
In ImageMagick 7.0.6-6, a memory exhaustion vulnerability was found in thefunction ReadTIFFImage, which allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12805` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13+esm8
imagemagick-common - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13+esm8
libmagick++5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13+esm8
libmagickcore5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13+esm8
libmagickcore5-extra - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13+esm8
libmagickwand5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13+esm8
perlmagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13+esm8
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13+esm8').
